alert.note: Alert for Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 11 at 5:50AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Victoria County through 630 AM CST... At 549 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fordtran, or 12 miles east of Cuero, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Inez, Fordtran and Salem. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 622 and 626. US Highway 77 between mile markers 560 and 568. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
